alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Fulton; Izard; Randolph; Sharp; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 12:07PM CDT until April 13 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Stone County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Randolph County in eastern Arkansas... Izard County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Northwestern Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Fulton County in north central Arkansas... Central Sharp County in north central Arkansas... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1206 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Oxford, or 8 miles north of Melbourne, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cherokee Village... Mountain View... Fairfield Bay... Melbourne... Ash Flat... Horseshoe Bend... Highland in Sharp County... Mammoth Spring... Hardy... Oxford... Mount Pleasant... Shirley... Franklin... Sidney... Ballard... Dalton... Lone Star... Gid... Herpel... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for eastern and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Fulton; Izard; Randolph; Sharp; Stone; Van Buren
